entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
